name: Assault Drone
tooltip: Releases an Assault Drone which has <d ref="duckiesCloneRykerDrone_Unit.vital_health.maximum"/> life and a weapon that attacks for <d ref="duckiesCloneRykerDrone_UnitWeaponDamage.amount" style="Red"/> damage every <d ref="duckiesCloneRykerDrone_UnitWeapon.period"/> seconds. Times out in <d ref="duckiesCloneRykerDrone_TimedLife.duration"/> seconds.
